description: This file defines an OCR service class that wraps around an OpenAI API service to extract dish names from menu images, applying specific prompts and handling various error cases.

classes.name: OcrService
classes.description: A class providing a text extraction service from menu images using OpenAI's API, focusing on extracting only dish names with specific instructions.

methods.name: extractMenuText
methods.description: Asynchronously extracts dish names from an image URL or base64 data URL, with timeout and error handling, returning a formatted string of dish names or an error message.
